Welcome to the CodingBuddy plugin marketplace for Claude Code.

Note: This page is for informational purposes. To install the plugin, use the CLI commands below.

Installation

# Add the marketplace (use GitHub repository format)
claude marketplace add JeremyDev87/codingbuddy

# Install the plugin
claude plugin install codingbuddy@jeremydev87
